CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price"), amc__Hours_Scheduled_Value_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c + amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Hours_Scheduled_Value_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula Field: Summarises the Hours Scheduled Value (Cost) + Material Costs Scheduled + Anticipated Project Expenses to provide full project costs
CustomField.label: Total Project Cost (Scheduled)
